      protected java.util.Collection<Validator<ValueType>> AbstractValidateableView.onGetRightErrorMessage()

      Classes in de.mrapp.android.validation.validators that implement Validator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractValidator<Type>
      An abstract base class for all validators, which should be able to validate values of a specific type.
      class  ConjunctiveValidator<Type>
      A validator, which allows to combine multiple validators in a conjunctive manner.
      class  DisjunctiveValidator<Type>
      A validator, which allows to combine multiple validators in a disjunctive manner.
      class  NegateValidator<Type>
      A validator, which allows to negate the result of an other validator.
      class  NotNullValidator
      A validator, which allows to ensure, that values are not null.
